name: bolo-multiplayer
description: Bolo multiplayer tank warfare game server

scripts.build: coffee -c node_modules/villain/*.coffee && coffee -c node_modules/villain/world/*.coffee && coffee -c node_modules/villain/world/net/*.coffee && coffee -c -o lib/ src/ && cake build:jsbundle
scripts.start: npm run build && node bin/bolo-server config.json
